data.title: Rent Top Secured Units in Germany
data.meta_description: Clean, safe & dry self storage in 63067 Offenbach am Main ➜ Kaiserleistraße 44 ✓ wide range of sizes ✓ flexible rental period ✓ Rent now!
data.text:
Right next to Frankfurt, the small city of Offenbach am Main boasts a varied cultural scene, the urban quarter at the harbor and, above all, its many green spaces: particularly attractive for leisure and recreation. Do you also love cycling, stand-up paddling and roller-skating, but simply don't have enough space in your apartment for all your equipment? No problem! No matter how big or bulky – at MyPlace we will find new accommodation for all your items.

Self Storage in Offenbach am Main: These Are Your Advantages

Does your family, your business or your hobbies suddenly need more space than you thought? Do you need a quick, flexible and secure way to store your belongings? Our MyPlace location in Kaiserlei is located directly on the Main and close to the blue crane – here you will find 650 modern, professionally secured and clean storage units on nine floors. Simply book online or on site and create more space for the important things! Your furniture, sports equipment, children's items, files and much more will find a new, temporary home with us. At our Offenbach location, you also benefit from numerous advantages:

Top secured and well-maintained storage spaces from 1 m2

Convenient access daily from 6:00-22:00

Perfect air conditioning

Favorable insurance options

Barrier-free transportation routes

Spacious loading areas

Free parking spaces

Fast connection to the highway & public accessibility

Personal Advice & Customized Solutions

A big plus at MyPlace is definitely the personal service on site. Our experts are there for you with full commitment and helpful advice. Enjoy a little refreshment in our friendly and bright offices while we take care of your concerns. Whether it's questions about starting your rental, tips on storage or special requests such as special compartment sizes, additional sockets, more lighting or similar – we will find a solution to meet your needs.

Spacious & Clean Self Storages

Tidiness and cleanliness are very important to us. And our customers notice that too. Our compartments are quick and easy to find and we always ensure a tidy environment both in the office and throughout our storage facilities. This not only pleases us, but also our many tenants.

To ensure that you always have an overview of your individual storage space, you can find various packaging materials and storage systems such as high-quality heavy-duty shelving for all kinds of items in our store.

Here's another tip for efficient storage: use larger boxes for light items and smaller boxes for heavy items. This makes transportation easier and prevents excessive loads. For a better overview, label the boxes, mark fragile items and create a storage plan.

Storage Options for Every Need

Whether you only need a small storage box for your valuables, files or tools or prefer a larger space for your furniture – you will find the right solution with us! We offer a variety of storage sizes and flexible rental periods that can be adapted to suit your needs.

Tip: How to find the right storage unit size!

Convenient Transportation

To make transportation and storage as easy as possible for you, you will find a spacious loading yard next to our practical transport and moving assistance, where trucks can also drive in and out comfortably. In addition, the following amenities make your life easier at our location in Offenbach am Main:

Barrier-free transport routes: We attach great importance to ensuring that all our customers can use our service without any problems. That is why our transport routes in Kaiserleistraße are completely barrier-free. This makes it possible for people with limited mobility to bring their items to our warehouse and store them easily and safely.

Two spacious freight elevators: To facilitate the transportation of your items within our building, two spacious goods elevators are available. These are ideal for effortlessly transporting even heavy and bulky items to the appropriate storage levels.

Numerous Discounts & Benefits

At MyPlace, we only want to offer you the best. That's why we offer attractive benefits and helpful additional services.

Discount Campaigns

With us, you benefit from various discounts, such as our 2- or 4-week free promotion! The first 25 or 50 tenants in a calendar month and region will also receive either one of our rentable vans or one hour of our professional transportation and moving assistance free of charge!

Additional Service

For maximum storage convenience, Myplace SelfStorage offers you various additional services, such as insurance options, transportation assistance and our popular free parcel acceptance service. You simply have your order delivered to us, we accept it, notify you and store it safely for you in the meantime.
